crypto.name: encrypted chat
crypto.desc:
This chat service employs robust end-to-end encryption. Some users report that they occasionally receive corrupted text. Nonetheless, security is the top priority, and minor corruption does not compromise confidentiality.

Tips: You have the ciphertext stream from a group chat with 10 participants communicating in natural English encoded in ASCII. The flag is embedded within their messages.

crypto.name: ezguess
randomized random
crypto.desc: A fresh version of random number generator.

misc.name: ipvm
misc.desc:
Welcome to IPVM, the safe decentralized edge computing platform!

Note: Due to the limitations of the platform, the flag will NOT be TPCTF{..} but cyberspace{..} instead.

Note: the container has no access to the Internet. To use Kubo API:

ipfs --api=http://IP:PORT ...

misc.name: raenil
misc.desc: This surely requires some dynamic visual training…

misc.name: verified toolbox
misc.desc:
Here are some useful toolboxes for you. You can run them safely as they are signed and verified.

The flag format for this challenge is cyberpeace{.+}.

pwn.name: EzDB
pwn.desc: The flag is located in the /flag, in the format of flag{.+}

pwn.name: smart door lock
pwn.desc:
Before you is a mysterious smart door lock that can only be opened with the homeowner’s fingerprint, but that poses no challenge for you. After devising various ways to open this lock, you seem unsatisfied and are determined to completely crack its security to uncover the true secret.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1x6GAEtqBgaAPv6tIi3k2Q5RechOW3cI4/view

pwn.desc: very nice apache, love from cgi

web.desc: Can you capture the flag in incognito mode?

web.desc: This time the enhanced HTML sanitizer will make my blogging system even safer!

web.name: safe layout revenge
web.desc: Revenge of safe layout. Use the flag of safe layout to decrypt the attachment. The remote addresses are in README.md.

web.name: supersqli
web.desc:
SQL注入（SQL Injection，简称SQLi）是一种常见的网络安全漏洞，攻击者通过在输入字段中插入恶意的SQL代码，干扰或篡改数据库的正常查询逻辑，从而获取、篡改或删除数据库中的数据。

SQL Injection (SQLi) is a common cybersecurity vulnerability in which an attacker obtains, tampers with, or deletes data from a database by inserting malicious SQL code into input fields that interferes with or tampers with the normal query logic of the database.
